SummaryEnglish:
The series followed a main character named Chirico Cuvie (Kiriko Kyuubi), a former special forces Armored Trooper pilot and former member of the Red Shoulder Battalion, an elite mecha force used by the Gilgamesh Confederation in its war against the Balarant Union—both interstellar nations within the distant Astragius Galaxy. Gilgamesh and Balarant had until recently been locked in a century-old galactic war whose cause was long ago forgotten. Now, the war is ending and an uneasy truce has settled.

Chirico Cuvie is suddenly transferred to a unit engaged in a suspicious mission, unaware that he is aiding to steal secrets from what appears to be his own side. Chirico is betrayed and left behind to die, but he survives, is arrested by the Gilgamesh military as a traitor, and tortured for information on their homeworld. He escapes—triggering a pursuit extending across the entire series, with Chirico hunted by the army and criminals alike as he seeks the truth behind the operation. He is driven to discover the truth of one of the objects he was assigned to retrieve in that operation: A mysterious and beautiful woman who would become his sole clue to unraveling the galactic conspiracy.

1.TitleEnglish: The Last Red Shoulder: The Unknown "Red Shoulder".
1.SummaryEnglish: Shortly following the events that transpired at Uoodo City, Chirico is bent on finding those who set him up as well as finding his precious Fyana. With no leads, he searches for the one man whom he believes to have had connections to the Secret Society he is seeking, Admiral Yolan Pailsen.

2.TitleEnglish: The Big Battle: Battle of the Heterogenous Species
2.SummaryEnglish: Chirico finds his beloved Fiana held hostage by Bararant in an experimental facility near Koba City, and he and his comrades have to fight their way in to save her.

3.TitleEnglish: Red Shoulder Document: Origin of Ambition
3.SummaryEnglish: The story of Chiriro's origin as part of a genetic experiment and recruitment into the Red Shoulder group.

4.SummaryEnglish: The Gilgamesh Confederation continues its assault on the Balarant Union with Chirico Cuvie on the front lines — but he is not alone. At his side stands a team of AT pilots who appear to be as invincible as Chirico himself.

5.SummaryEnglish: Irvine Lester is an AT repairman. In order to make a living with his sister, he is secretly fighting in AT gambling matches and intentionally losing the games for money. But the other fighters find out about his excellent AT maneuvering skills and demand a real match.

6.SummaryEnglish: An "alternate universe" OAV that centers around Aki Tesuno, a Bottoms guard for scrap salvagers and a pilot of a robotic mecha called an At or Altro (as opposed to VOTOMS' trademark Armored Trooper mecha).

7.SummaryEnglish: Chirico meets up with Gotho and friends at an oasis town for the first time in over 30 years.

12.TitleEnglish: Vol. I: Stories of the "A.T. VOTOMS."
12.SummaryEnglish: A chronological compilation of the TV series.

13.TitleEnglish: Vol. II: Highlights from the "A.T. VOTOMS."
13.SummaryEnglish: Contains all the previews for each episode narrated by Ginga Banjou, and is a collection of famous scenes featuring the three characters Cocona, Vanilla, and Gouto.

14.SummaryEnglish: Chirico meets up with Gotho and friends at an oasis town for the first time in over 30 years.

1.SummaryEnglish: Chirico Cuvie demands answers when his unit opens fires on their forces during a top-secret mission, but his superior officer stonewalls him. What is going on?

2.SummaryEnglish: Months after the mission that changed his life forever, Chirico hides in the wretched hive known as Uoodo. What recourse does he have when he is enslaved by a local gang?

3.SummaryEnglish: Chirico has plans for the ruined Scopedog he found in the junkyard. Will this be the opportunity he needs to turn his luck around?

4.SummaryEnglish: Recognizing Chirico's expertise as a pilot, Gotho offers him an opportunity to make his fortune in the underground VOTOMS gladiatorial sport known as Battling.

5.SummaryEnglish: Chirico is caught by powerful people who believe the soldier was sent to Uoodo under orders. As they torture him for information, Chirico's allies plan a rescue mission.

6.SummaryEnglish: Reflecting upon the events thus far, Chirico leaves to face the chief of police. His allies plan a daring heist without him.

7.SummaryEnglish: Rumors swirl of the police using a city-wide sweep as cover for a mysterious transport. Intrigued, Chirico investigates.

8.SummaryEnglish: The crew celebrates, but Chirico wishes no part in the spoils. While the police react, another player watches from the shadows.

9.SummaryEnglish: Chirico faces the wrath of the police alone. Enraged, Coconna demands that the crew return to help their friend.

10.SummaryEnglish: The police adopt a scorched earth policy in their attempts to flush Chirico and his allies out. Forced to run, the four take drastic measures to save their own lives.

11.SummaryEnglish: The Prototype defies a direct order to engage Chirico in combat. The police chief and Borough attempt to discover why while the AT pilot dominates the battle.

12.SummaryEnglish: Chirico and the Prototype are discussing their situation when the police discover their location. Borough proposes that Battling pilots chase after them.

13.SummaryEnglish: The military occupies Uoodo and demands the surrender of police forces. Chief Iskui is ordered by his superior to buy time so the Prototype can be smuggled out of the city.

14.SummaryEnglish: Three months after the events on Uoodo, a new chapter unfolds as Chirico finds himself on the front lines as a mercenary in the war-torn kingdom of Kummen.

15.SummaryEnglish: Captain Kan Yu's assistance arrives just in time and Chirico is questioned for his battlefield decision. A PS is a deadly opponent, so what are their options when facing one?

16.SummaryEnglish: The mercenaries fend off a guerrilla raid, but Pol is shocked when he recognizes one of the attackers. Chirico discovers Pol's connection to the Kummen army.

17.SummaryEnglish: Chirico miscalculated, and the enemy was not who he thought it was. Despite this, he's still determined to find answers, and the two soldiers clash.

18.SummaryEnglish: Chirico's been found, but his miraculous survival causes the suspicious Captain Kan Yu to accuse him of switching sides and demands his interrogation.

19.SummaryEnglish: A Melkian officer plans to inspect the front lines when the Veela unleash their assault on EX-10 and Niitan. Vanilla refuses to abandon the club despite Coconna's urging.

20.SummaryEnglish: Chirico reflects upon his previous adventure and the events that led to his reunion with Fyana in Uoodo.

21.SummaryEnglish: Chirico is put in charge of an operation against enemy headquarters. Kan Yu objects, believing he should be in command instead.

22.SummaryEnglish: Kan Yu is criticized for his actions and ordered to follow a new strategy as everyone's plans seemingly depend on Chirico.

23.SummaryEnglish: Fyana seizes an opportunity and flees into the jungle. An injured Borough is enraged when he realizes that Ypsilon has gone after her and orders the unthinkable.

24.SummaryEnglish: Loyalties are tested after Chirico rewards his friends with the truth after they save both him and Fyana from an ambush.

25.SummaryEnglish: A man left for dead refuses to die, despite everything the jungle throws at him. Meanwhile, Chirico's group plans their assault.

26.SummaryEnglish: Vanilla must join a massive assault, despite Gotho and Coconna's concerns. With the forces converging on the palace, is the war finally coming to an end?

27.SummaryEnglish: Three figures muse over the status of the war as fighting rages on the planet below. Chirico confronts Borough and demands answers regarding the PS.

28.SummaryEnglish: Before the next adventure begins, Chirico recalls painful memories of his past exploits in Uoodo.

29.SummaryEnglish: Chirico and Fyana may have escaped Kummen, but they now find themselves in an undisclosed and seemingly abandoned location. For what purpose are they there?

30.SummaryEnglish: Chirico and Fyana attempt to thwart their attackers, but they are too numerous. Does the enemy have good reasons for its actions?

31.SummaryEnglish: The captain is done playing and vows to capture Chirico and Fyana. A distraction is all it takes for Chirico's AT to suffer critical damage.

32.SummaryEnglish: Chirico's condition deteriorates, and Fyana must take drastic measures if she wishes to save him.

33.SummaryEnglish: Chirico and Fyana fight at a disadvantage against Ypsilon. How will they turn the tide when Ypsilon's hatred for Chirico drives him to a single-minded purpose?

34.SummaryEnglish: A brawl with a scavenger gang leads to a reunion with an old friend. Meanwhile, a captain must decide whether to continue a mission or pursue Chirico.

35.SummaryEnglish: The ATs stare each other down in grim anticipation of the coming battle. When the Balarant suddenly attack, everyone must scramble for their lives.

36.SummaryEnglish: The trio is alone in the desert and low on oxygen. Zophie has not forgotten, nor has she forgiven. But to survive, she may need Chirico's assistance regardless.

37.SummaryEnglish: Repairs on the AT continue, but the Balarant forces are quickly approaching. Chirico wants his friends to save themselves, but they have other plans.

38.SummaryEnglish: Ypsilon and Chirico are destined to fight over and over. But when they are both trapped by debris, can Ypsilon set aside his hatred in the interest of mutual survival?

39.SummaryEnglish: With the immediate danger behind them, Chirico and Ypsilon prepare for their sworn rematch. Will they finally be able to settle things once and for all?

40.SummaryEnglish: Time is a flat circle. Chirico remembers how he escaped from Kummen alongside Fyana, only to end up on a mysterious warship.

41.SummaryEnglish: With his ship crashed, Chirico has no choice but to venture into the hostile deserts of Quent if he wishes to continue his mission.

42.SummaryEnglish: The Society no longer underestimates Chirico and considers him a legitimate threat. Meanwhile, Chirico and Shako must brave the desert on their travels.

43.SummaryEnglish: The twins decide to make planetfall. Meanwhile, Chirico requests entrance to the Quentman village.

44.SummaryEnglish: There can be no more room for doubt in the Society's mind: Quent contains a trove of advanced technology. What will be their next move after this discovery?

45.SummaryEnglish: The events on Quent captures the attention of another party, which deploys its forces in response. Chirico and Shako explore the ruins beneath the planet's surface.

46.SummaryEnglish: As Gilgamesh and Balarant forces prepare for battle, the Society wonders how they can use this to their advantage. Unless something changes, Quent will turn into a warzone.

47.SummaryEnglish: The battle rages over the planet. To the victor goes Quent's secrets. Chirico's friends escape in a stolen Gilgamesh ship but are quickly intercepted by the Balarant.

48.SummaryEnglish: Onboard a ship not under their control, its passengers can only wait as it ventures closer to an object that is clearly no moon. What awaits all of them inside?

49.SummaryEnglish: A 3,000-year-old truth unites the warring Gilgamesh and Balarant into a single, vengeful army. Meanwhile, what are the implications for Wiseman's plans with Chirico?

50.SummaryEnglish: A failed mutiny solidifies Chirico's control. The joint Gilgamesh/Balarant fleet devises ways to fight Wiseman. As forces converge, a question burns: How can one stop a god?

51.SummaryEnglish: History is filled with men who sacrificed everything in pursuit of power. Fyana refuses to let her love be one of them. Is Chirico truly willing to make everyone his enemy?

52.SummaryEnglish: The road was long and hard-fought but in the end, a choice will be made. That choice will determine the fate of the entire galaxy.

1.SummaryEnglish: Decades ago, two people took drastic measures to ensure their escape from a galaxy engulfed by war. Unfortunately, the past has finally caught up to them.

2.SummaryEnglish: Chirico doesn’t care what Titania wants nor that the COMPLANT is falling apart around them. Fyana is the only person who matters and Chirico won’t stop until he gets her back.

3.SummaryEnglish: Cardinal Montwell uses a recent accomplishment as leverage. Titania seeks out someone intimately familiar with Chirico’s history.

4.SummaryEnglish: The deliberations take a shocking turn with the delivery of unexpected news. Titania finally comes face to face with Fyana.

5.SummaryEnglish: Chirico is coming for Fyana and woe be to anyone who stands in the way. The final confrontation between Chirico and Titania is approaching. Who will be left standing?

1.SummaryEnglish: Chirico Cuvie joins the invasion of a Balarant Union stronghold, but the Balarant defenses are up to the challenge of the assault.

2.SummaryEnglish: Chirico lands on the planet Galeade, where he meets the members of his new squadron under the command of Barkoff... but for what purpose have they been brought together?

3.SummaryEnglish: A fifth member is added to Barkoff's team, but is he an asset or a liability?

4.SummaryEnglish: A botched mission leads to disastrous consequences for the Gilgamesh Army.

5.SummaryEnglish: Defiant against even insurmountable opposition, Pailsen resists attempts at interrogation, but his silence is no match for the insidious MRC device.

6.SummaryEnglish: As the MRC continues its torturous work, Pailsen reveals the truth behind Chirico's seeming invincibility.

7.SummaryEnglish: Barkoff's team is ordered to a base near the planet's north pole, but a malfunction with their transport plane leaves them unexpectedly stranded.

8.SummaryEnglish: A new crisis threatens to wipe out the planet's atmosphere, but the changing weather isn't the only threat looming on the horizon...

9.SummaryEnglish: With time running out, the team must concoct a PRL formula that can withstand the oncoming extreme cold. Meanwhile, Wappe sets off on a mission of his own.

10.SummaryEnglish: Wokkam proposes a major attack on Monad, the Balarant fortress-planet, but there is more to this attack than meets the eye.

11.SummaryEnglish: As Gilgamesh operatives invade Monad, Chirico's origins are at last brought to light.

12.SummaryEnglish: Time is running out as Monad spirals toward destruction. Can Chirico make it out in time, or is his journey fated to end at last?

4.SummaryEnglish: As a 25th anniversary present to Vanilla and Coconna, Gotho takes them on a tour of the places they spent with Chirico Cuvie from the original series. Along the way, they meet up with old friends, relive their memories, and become involved in a 3000 year old prophecy.

1.SummaryEnglish: The more things change, the more they stay the same. Coconna and Vanilla take a trip down memory lane by returning to where their story first began.

2.SummaryEnglish: Despite Pol’s best efforts, Kummen plunged into war once again. By the time Chirico’s friends arrive, the government has erupted into a full-blown coup d’état.

3.SummaryEnglish: Zophie once bore a vendetta against Chirico. Now an old woman, she takes in a stranger, but what will she do when she discovers who he really is?

4.SummaryEnglish: Plots take shape as word spreads about the "Child of God" and people realize the fate of the galaxy is at stake. Chirico must escort the child to the Tower of Gomor.

5.SummaryEnglish: Chirico and Shako find themselves deep beneath the surface and in the company of a mysterious girl who warns them about the Doyo.

6.SummaryEnglish: Forces converge above the planet. Chirico soldiers on, determined to rescue the child entrusted to him, and once again faces an important choice.
